title: Infiltration
tagline: in which the Dunmar Fellowship breaches Raven's Hold
summary: The Fellowship bypasses a locked gate and navigates through underground tunnels to a storeroom within Raven's Hold.
Riswynn climbs out of the tunnel, and after reconnaissance, the group ambushes and destroys two undead hobgoblins in a disused prison.
Splitting up, the Fellowship scouts the area, noting gnoll guards and wild animals nearby, while Kenzo finds empty towers and a prisoner, Vola.
Kenzo invisibly scouts the towers, discovering an orc and two jackalweres, which the party defeats to rescue Vola, a Society of the Open Scroll member.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship breaks into Raven's Hold, scouts the surroundings, and rescues a prisoner named Vola from an orc and jackalweres.
